Key Match Events: Syria scored three goals, including a late 96th-minute goal by Pablo Sabbag; India had several chances but were outclassed by Syria's clinical performance; Syria's second goal in the 77th minute was a turning point against the run of play
Post-Match Reflections: Manolo Marquez, India's coach, expressed frustration but praised the team's second-half performance; India finished last in the tournament due to a loss and no wins
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at Gachibowli Athletic Stadium, Hyderabad; India's performance in the second half was their best but not enough to secure a win; Syria's clinical nature in front of goal was the decisive factor
